items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So comfortable and stretchy
items.body: there is a lot of things I love about this dress. For one the flow of the dress is amazing. I really love how it hangs down at the bottom. Itâ€™s not too tight itâ€™s not too loose. Itâ€™s perfect. For two. The slit in the dress is not too high at all. I wore exactly how it came in the package. I did not tie it or tighten it, more or less it was exactly perfect for my body personally. the third thing I like about this dress the most is the insulation in the dress, itâ€™s not seethrough and the fabric and dress itself is thick. I really loved it! Read more
items.author: Lyeah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would but this again in other colors.
items.body: This dress was bad!!! As in good looking all over. Had my body looking right. Wore this to my dad's red and white party, let's just say a lot of eyes were on me. I believe I ordered a size small. In the color red. Read more
items.author: TaeQueen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit great!!
items.body: Was pleasantly surprised by the fit and quality of the material. Iâ€™m 5â€™8â€ and 136 pounds and the medium size fit like a glove. I was worried about the height of the slit on the model in the picture and read one review here that said the height is adjustable. It is!! Iâ€™m mostly leg and even so I was able to adjust the tie and ruching easily to a modest height. Material is soft and was not see through at all with some flash photography. I got the black color and it was a nice true jet black. Definitely get it if you want a LBD for a night out that still covers your arms and gives good coverage on backside as well. Read more
items.author: Lor In

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Donâ€™t get a bigger size and dress is not see through
items.body: Dress was really nice but I ordered a larger size do to reviews but itâ€™s true to size so just order your size no need to go up sizes also size guide is off but dress is very nice just had to return it since itâ€™s too big but i will be ordering my correct size Read more
items.author: Rosabel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress that will make you feel elegant but sexy
items.body: Dress fit perfect. For reference I am 5â€™1 about 115 pounds. The length and ability to tie the side of the dress was perfect. Allowing you to show off as much skin as you please without over doing it. The material was soft and stretchy to fit to your body. I got a lot of compliments and loved that I also bought the dress in black. Considering purchasing the red one next. Read more
items.author: AB

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, but not as long as the pictures.
items.body: I got this dress in and I was soooo excited. However, it was a lot shorter than the pictures depict. Still cute and fit, just wasnâ€™t exactly what I was expecting. Read more
items.author: Jenn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite dress!
items.body: Needed a last minute dress for my birthday photoshoot and this dress was PERFECT! I absolutely loved the slit in it and how it was adjustable! The material was very comfortable and felt super soft! The dress was very stretchy, light, and was pretty flattering! I feel like this dress would be very functional for a lot of different events! Definitely worth the buy! Read more
items.author: Bridget graves

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Bodycon Split Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi Bodycon Split Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Purple, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
